Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends certain provisions authorizing an occupancy tax in the town of Skaneateles
Summary: Extends certain provisions authorizing an occupancy tax in the town of Skaneateles to 12/31/2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 304 of the laws of 2023, amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the town of Skaneateles, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
